attributes.additional_details: We need to make it affordable to use cars for business usage
attributes.background: The AMAP rates were last increased in 2012 and since then the average cost of a new car has risen by an average 20%, Car insurance has increased by 40% and fuel has increased by 35%

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Increase the HMRC Mileage Rate from 45p/mile to 60p/mile: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/600966

Increase the tax-free approved Mileage Allowance Payment rate and review yearly: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/601286
